WorkItem.ClosedComment: Not a bug, the item itself isn't unique so its not going to be unique in Rawr unless you set it that way. The Optimizer Documentation explains this. averiy provided the fix
WorkItem.Description:
* Description - Figurine - Earthen Guardian, while not labeled Unique or Unique-Equipped, are effectively so. Indicating that you have one, because Stamina is favored so highly, means that Bear.rawr automatically tells you to get two of them.
 
* Steps to Reproduce - 
1) Launch application
2) Load character
3) Mark JC trinkets as available for optimization.
4) Optimize
 
* Version Number/Additional Information - Rawr version 4.0.13.0b, hosted on Elitistjerks. JC trinkets are obtained by world-drop quest items, a la Damaged Necklace, but you only ever see one. Once I hit 475 JC, I nailed the Stamina trinket, the Agi trinket, the Int trinket, and the Spirit trinket all within half an hour's time. (I am a druid. I can only assume this is why I have yet to see the Strength trinket.)
 
* Details - 4.0.13.0b
 
* Attachment - Attach your character file that reproduces the issue.

Comments.Message: Right-click on the trinket in question, and select Edit.  On the left side of the pane is a checkbox for Unique.  Check that, select OK, and re-optimize, and you will only be told to itemize one of that trinket.
